samaja deshapalana parisaraye tharkanukula wiya hakka paridima mahinda rajapaksha yugaye di shri lanka nidahas pakshaya sammuthi athi kara gaththe 1978 je.aar. jayawardhanage prathisanskarana walin samajaya thula nirmanaya wu padada samaja stharayan samangaya. 1978 di athi kala aarthika, samaja ha deshapalana prathisanskaranayanta wikalpa wu samaja wyaparayak nomathiwa eeta kata kabalithi walin paharademin siti pakshayakata wenath tharkanukula awasanayak nomathiwima swabhawikaya. 2015 wanawita mahinda rajapakshage “deshapalana kramaya” ehi kutaprapthiyata path wemin padada samaja kramaye hasuruwanna bawata rajaya pathwa thibuni.
